item.title: Price Forecasting - Facebook Prophet
item.description: The objective of this project is to forecast the future price of Avocado. The data presents a time series of the average Avocado price of different regions in the US over 4 years timeline. The data from the years 2015-2017 have been used to forecast the average price of Avocado in 2018. Different exploratory data analysis (EDA) has been performed to gain insights from the data. EDA included: analyzing distributions (violin plot), regions affecting price hike (box plot), and trends (line plot).
